title: when i update client and press "launch" game isnot starting ! can anyone tell me what shoud i do ?!
body:
when i update client and press "launch" game isnot starting ! can anyone tell me what shoud i do ?!
(i try reinstall but isnot work)

replies.body: I've got the same problem on OSX El Capitan. Anyone had luck trying security changes?

This can happen if your security settings are preventing league from launching.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get the client open.  Let me know if you have any questions!
same problem with mac how can i fix it

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Use this. It fixed the same problem for me just a few minutes ago.
yeah, that did not help me, i still have the issue.
